name: Lion Character Creator
description:
Lion Character Creator

Hello!

This project contains a character creator made in Unity, and a tutorial explaining its development, dedicated for beginning game designers. It was inspired by productions such as Feral Heart, Impressive World and Arokai.

It's a subject of my university thesis, so I would be very grateful if you could answer some questions about it under this link:

  1. English: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/1FXDJR/
  2. Polish: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/1SF8GJ/

Thank you for your help!

Description:  Fantasy-themed character creator for an MMORPG featuring a realistic lion avatar, with in-game tutorial depictioning all of the steps of it's development, which aims to help beginning game developers.

Supported language: English, Polish.

Controls:

  • WASD – Movement
  • Left ctrl - Lock camera
  • Left shift  - Sprint
  • Z - Screenshot
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Enter - Save character name
